product_name: Manduka Go Play Yoga Mat Carrier
long_description: Delightful, innovative and thoughtfully designed for hands-free portability, the Manduka Go Play Yoga Mat Carrier is sleek, spirited and sized to fit any yoga mat. Quick-release buckles for optimal mat accessibility. Large storage pocket for valuables. Comfortable carrying handles offer dual carrying options and hands-free portability. The Manduka Go Play Yoga Mat Carrier is weather- and water-resistant. bluesign(R) certifies that at least 90% of the fabric complies with strict safety and environmental requirements.
short_description: Delightful, innovative and thoughtfully designed for hands-free portability, the Manduka Go Play Yoga Mat Carrier is sleek, spirited and sized to fit any yoga mat.
